description: List the workload shares associated with the workload.

parameters.name: WorkloadId
parameters.description: The ID assigned to the workload. This ID is unique within an Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: WorkloadId
nested_items.description: The ID assigned to the workload. This ID is unique within an Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: WorkloadShareSummaries
nested_items.description: A list of workload share summaries.

nested_items.name: ShareId
nested_items.description: The ID associated with the share.

nested_items.name: SharedWith
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID, organization ID, or organizational unit (OU) ID with which the workload, lens, profile, or review template is shared.

nested_items.name: PermissionType
nested_items.description: Permission granted on a share request.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the share request.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: Optional message to compliment the Status field.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next set of results.
